title: The Samurai. Volume 1
creator_credit: Senkosha, Toshio Kobayashi and Toru Toyama
brief_description: Three episodes from the classic 60’s television series. Shintaro and Tombie, “the Mist”, travel feudal Japan battling the evil Kongo of Koga, the dreaded Fuma Ninja and the Phantom Ninja. Shintaro, the great Samurai master, unleashes an exciting blend of action, magic and swordsmanship to overcome the forces of darkness. “The Poison Dart”: Kongo devises a clever plan to kill Shintaro. During a fierce battle Shintaro is struck by a poison dart. Kongo and his evil Ninja appear to have won. Revenge: Friends of Shintaro have now given up hope. Is he really dead? Will his revenge be successful against Kongo? “The Master Ninja”: The Phantom Ninja are tricked into coming to the Shogun’s palace by Kongo, who then recruits them for his evil purposes.
